lily_proposal.speaker: Lily
lily_proposal.text: *She approaches with unusual energy* I have a proposition. A challenge, if you will. Cook your best dish - not for your customers, but for me.

lily_explain.speaker: Lily
lily_explain.text: In return, I will cook for you. We shall compare our philosophies through our cooking. Your 'heart' against my precision. May the better approach win.

choices.text: I accept! Let's learn from each other.
This isn't a competition, Lily. We can both cook well.

lily_pleased.speaker: Lily
lily_pleased.text: *A genuine smile crosses her face* Excellent. I shall prepare my Gourmet Special - a dish that took me years to perfect. Every element calculated to the gram.

lily_insistent.speaker: Lily
lily_insistent.text: *She shakes her head* It must be a competition. That's how we improve - by measuring ourselves against others. Please... I need this.

lily_teach.speaker: Lily
lily_teach.text: Here - *she pulls out a worn recipe card* The Gourmet Special. Study it. Master it if you can. We cook tomorrow evening.

lily_warning.speaker: Lily
lily_warning.text: *Her expression turns serious* I should warn you - I have never made this dish anything less than perfect. Be prepared to witness true culinary excellence.
